imdb.plot outline: It's Somethin' Suave' Theater. That little semi-glorious waste of 2 hours of your time. Hosted by Tim Caldwell, the show brings you an eclectic mix of cartoons, classic commercials, animated shorts, music videos and even a movie. It's Halloween and Tim plays the classic Night of the Living Dead. And he also passes out candy to the neighborhood kids. So sit back, max and relax, grab a mental margarita and enjoy.
imdb.title: Somethin' Suave' Theater OSI74 Version
akas: Somethin' Suave' Theater OSI74 Version (United States)
